title: Basic Baked Chicken Breasts
snippet: Simple yet refined, basic but definitely not boring. Accent with butter, garlic, parsley, or other spices, or eat plain and hot out of the oven.

title: Easy Grilled Teriyaki Chicken
snippet: Chicken breasts marinated in teriyaki sauce, lemon, garlic, and sesame oil, then grilled to a tasty finish. Very easy and great for a hot summer's evening.

title: Chicken al Pastor
snippet: GOD TIER. You cannot comprehend the yum in this Jim Grant original.

title: Pan-Fried Chicken Nuggets
snippet: Fried to a crisp. Coat with a sweet sauce for maximum deliciousness.

title: Sweet 'n Smokey Bacon Chicken
snippet: Exactly what it says on the tin.

title: Pizza Smothered Chicken
snippet: Like a pizza, but without all that doughy stuff.

title: Better-Than-Takeout Orange Chicken
snippet: Sweet, spicy, and, most importantly: crispy. This delicious homemade orange chicken recipe is easy to make and super tasty.
